channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Boomer Candy' Funds Are Hot. The Taxes Are Not.
item.description: Investors piling into these fast-growing funds may be surprised by their tax bills

item.title: Hedge-fund giant Man says assets reach record levels
item.description: Man Group, the world’s largest publicly traded hedge fund manager, on Friday said investment gains helped its assets under management grow by 17.5% in the first half to record highs of $178.2 billion.

item.title: The Junk in Your Index Fund Is Costing You Big-Time
item.description: Small-cap stocks are on a roll, but the simplest and most popular way to buy them should carry a warning label.

item.title: Market bubbles expand longer than many expect. But this metric shows valuations will matter.
item.description: Valuation may not matter in the short term but it eventually does, says this fund manager

item.title: Dow Industrials Rise After Surprisingly Strong GDP Data
item.description: Smaller companies outperform, extending stock-market rotation; Nasdaq and S&P fall.

item.title: Liquidation of crowded trades so far is healthy — but these levels must hold, says Bank of America
item.description: Expectations over Fed rate cuts and a presidential victory by former President Donald Trump are what’s behind a liquidation of the most crowded trades that so far is healthy, says a Bank of America strategist.

item.title: Can Bill Ackman Turn Social-Media Stardom Into a Blockbuster IPO?
item.description: The billionaire investor is aiming to raise billions of dollars for a publicly traded fund next week.

item.title: ‘I am an only child’: My father left his $50 million estate to my stepmother in an irrevocable trust. I inherited $1 million. Is this reasonable?
item.description: “Is it common for entire estates to be left to the second spouse instead of being divided among the children?”

item.title: Carmakers' Inventory Pain Is Consumers' Gain
item.description: As Ford struggles with the cost of repairs, Chrysler owner Stellantis and Nissan focus on thinning out dealer lots.

item.title: ‘I’m having panic attacks’: My ex-husband emptied our joint bank accounts, hacked into my email and stole my life savings. Do I have any recourse?
item.description: “I’m working with the fund manager, as I found some emails where he pretended to be me on some forged documents.”
